CustomField.description: BODEV-2718: Formula field to return the base price for renewal incl. pricing factors. In case Initial Default Price is blank, Original Contract Price ARR is used instead.
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Type,"Existing Business-Renewal"), For_Renewal__c = TRUE ), /* If Initiali Default Price is blank, alternate with Original Price ARR/One-off */ IF( ISBLANK(Initial_Default_Price_ARR_One_off__c), Original_Price_ARR_OneOff__c * Quantity, Total_Initial_Default_Price_ARR_One_off__c ) + Cumulative_Indexation_amount__c + Upcoming_Indexation_amount__c + Renewal_Uplift_amount__c, NULL )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The base price for renewal incl. pricing factors. Total Initial Default Price + Pricing Factors.
CustomField.label: Renewal Base Total Price ARR
